items.title: Bias after Prompting: Persistent Discrimination in Large Language Models
items.description:

items.title: mcp-context-forge - A Model Context Protocol (MCP) Gateway & Registry. Serves as a central management point for tools, resources, and prompts that can be accessed by MCP-compatible LLM applications. Converts REST API endpoints to MCP, composes virtual MCP servers with added security and observability, and converts between protocols (stdio, SSE, Streamable HTTP).
items.description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) Gateway & Registry. Serves as a central management point for tools, resources, and prompts that can be accessed by MCP-compatible LLM applications. items.title: KAG - KAG is a logical form-guided reasoning and retrieval framework based on OpenSPG engine and LLMs.  It is used to build logical reasoning and factual Q&A solutions for professional domain knowledge bases.
